title: Is it true that Recep Tayyip Erdogan is currently the most famous political leader in the whole Islamic world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Traditionally, leadership in the Islamic world doesn't require a great deal of substance, ability, knowledge or talents. Exceptions are there. All one needs to do is to brag, boast about past glories, real and imagined and, not infrequently, issue terrifying or intimidating proclamations of a religious nature against other groups or nations, grander the better. Putting on a public display of religious observances would be of great help. Rest assured, millions of fans will line up before you. Erdogan is a pastmaster in everything noted above. Hence, the reason for his ‘fame’ and popularity.
